guide.title: Game Guide
guide.description: ChipBlockCrush is a block puzzle game. Place blocks on the grid; when a full row or column is completed, it clears and you earn points.
guide.step1: Select one of the given blocks and place it on an empty area of the board (drag or touch).
guide.step2: When a row or column is full, it clears automatically and you earn points.
guide.step3: Game over when you can't place any block. The goal is to last as long as possible by clearing lines.

help.title: Help
help.faq1: Q: How do I place blocks? A: Click (or touch) a block and drag it to an empty cell on the board.
help.faq2: Q: How do I score? A: Complete a line to clear it. Clearing multiple lines at once gives bonus points.
